Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Storm \Storm\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Stormed}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Storming}.] (Mil.) To assault; to attack, and attempt to take, by scaling walls, forcing gates, breaches, or the like; as, to storm a fortified town. [1913 Webster]
